text: In the end, a piece of dental floss saved the day. Rachel Brosnahan ’ s otherwise perfect night at the Emmy Awards — which included not only a trophy for best actress in a comedy for Amazon ’ s “ The Marvelous Mrs. Maisel ” but also a win for comedy series, among others — had one tiny flaw. There was the little matter of the diamond ring she couldn ’ t get off her hand. Hours earlier, in her rush to get dressed, she tried on the “ beautiful, beautiful ” ring. But then she wanted to switch it to another finger — and it wouldn ’ t budge. “ And then you know when you start pulling on something, it just gets swollen, ” she recounts the next morning over a late breakfast in her hotel room in West Hollywood. “ So I was on
